actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act creating the Indian Claims Commission to repeal the provision limiting the activities of commissioners during the two years following their terms of office.

summary.text: Repeals the prohibition preventing former Indian Claims Commissioners from representing any Indian interest, or having any financial interest in any Indian claim, for a two-year period after leaving office.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act creating the Indian Claims Commission to repeal the provision limiting the activities of commissioners during the two years following their terms of office.
